bug.author: markus-weiss
bug.summary: Bug in SoccerTwos-Example: The Heuristic method was not implemented
bug.description:
Hello, I have cloned the ml-agents-repo and opened the SoccerTwos-Example and hit the play-button but the editor paused and I recived the following errormessage: <denchmark-code>UnityAgentsException: The Heuristic method was not implemented for the Agent on the PurpleGoalie GameObject. MLAgents.Agent.Heuristic () (at Assets/ML-Agents/Scripts/Agent.cs:473) MLAgents.HeuristicPolicy.DecideAction () (at Assets/ML-Agents/Scripts/Policy/HeuristicPolicy.cs:35) MLAgents.Agent.DecideAction () (at Assets/ML-Agents/Scripts/Agent.cs:909) MLAgents.Academy.EnvironmentStep () (at Assets/ML-Agents/Scripts/Academy.cs:407) MLAgents.AcademyFixedUpdateStepper.FixedUpdate () (at Assets/ML-Agents/Scripts/Academy.cs:32) </denchmark-code>
I tested it on "0.12-version", "0.13-version" and with "git clone --branch latest_release" like in the installation-instuction. Will the heuristic function be implement in future, or does the error lie elsewhere? Greeting, markus

comments.comment: We currently do not have a model trained for the soccer environment and there is no heuristic method implemented.
